abstract: Subscribes to the provided service over Wi-Fi, providing browse results for connecting to the specified paired devices if available.

declaration.code: static func connecting(to pairedDevices: WASubscriberBrowser.Devices, from mySubscribingService: WASubscribableService) -> WASubscriberBrowser.Action

overview:
## Return Value

A new `Action` configuring this operation.

## Discussion

When subscribing, the `NetworkBrowser` provides a [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAEndpoint] for each discovered paired device, and the app can then create a `NetworkConnection` object to connect to each. Data path parameters including the [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAPerformanceMode] are set when creating the connection, using [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAParameters] written into the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Network/NWParameters] for the `NetworkConnection`.

# connecting(to:from:)

**Type Method**

Subscribes to the provided service over Wi-Fi, providing browse results for connecting to the specified paired devices if available.

## Declaration

```swift
static func connecting(to pairedDevices: WASubscriberBrowser.Devices, from mySubscribingService: WASubscribableService) -> WASubscriberBrowser.Action
```

## Parameters

- **pairedDevices**: The devices to connect to. The browser isnâ€™t activated if no devices are specified.
- **mySubscribingService**: The service to discover.

## Return Value

A new `Action` configuring this operation.

## Discussion

When subscribing, the `NetworkBrowser` provides a [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAEndpoint] for each discovered paired device, and the app can then create a `NetworkConnection` object to connect to each. Data path parameters including the [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAPerformanceMode] are set when creating the connection, using [doc://com.apple.wifiaware/documentation/WiFiAware/WAParameters] written into the [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Network/NWParameters] for the `NetworkConnection`.
title: connecting(to:from:)
